name: Frizzle Lecture Viewer
summary:
Watch scheduled university lectures in VR!

Watching online lectures on YouTube is difficult. There's way too many distractions, so you end up checking your phone or opening up cat videos in another tab. It's also easy to procrastinate since, you  can always watch a lecture "later".

The mass availability of online lectures is great. But it's still a much worse experience than being in a real lecture hall.

Frizzle lecture viewer is an experiment in a better way to watch online lectures. It's in a VR...
